软件包 android.app 的分层结构

软件包分层结构：
所有软件包

类分层结构

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.app.ActivityManager
    • android.app.ActivityManager.MemoryInfo (implements android.os.Parcelable)
    • android.app.ActivityManager.ProcessErrorStateInfo (implements android.os.Parcelable)
    • android.app.ActivityManager.RecentTaskInfo (implements android.os.Parcelable)
    • android.app.ActivityManager.RunningAppProcessInfo (implements android.os.Parcelable)
    • android.app.ActivityManager.RunningServiceInfo (implements android.os.Parcelable)
    • android.app.ActivityManager.RunningTaskInfo (implements android.os.Parcelable)
    • android.app.AlarmManager
    • android.app.AlertDialog.Builder
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.app.Application (implements android.content.ComponentCallbacks)
        • android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
          • android.app.Activity (implements android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback)
            • android.app.ActivityGroup
              • android.app.TabActivity
            • android.app.AliasActivity
            • android.app.ExpandableListActivity (implements android.widget.ExpandableListView.OnChildClickListener, android.widget.ExpandableListView.OnGroupCollapseListener, android.widget.ExpandableListView.OnGroupExpandListener, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener)
            • android.app.ListActivity
              • android.app.LauncherActivity
        • android.app.Service (implements android.content.ComponentCallbacks)
          • android.app.IntentService
    • android.app.Dialog (implements android.content.DialogInterface, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback)
      • android.app.AlertDialog (implements android.content.DialogInterface)
        • android.app.DatePickerDialog (implements android.widget.DatePicker.OnDateChangedListener, android.content.DialogInterface.OnClickListener)
        • android.app.ProgressDialog
        • android.app.TimePickerDialog (implements android.content.DialogInterface.OnClickListener, android.widget.TimePicker.OnTimeChangedListener)
    • android.app.Instrumentation
    • android.app.Instrumentation.ActivityMonitor
    • android.app.Instrumentation.ActivityResult
    • android.app.KeyguardManager
    • android.app.KeyguardManager.KeyguardLock
    • android.app.LauncherActivity.IconResizer
    • android.app.LauncherActivity.ListItem
    • android.app.LocalActivityManager
    • android.app.Notification (implements android.os.Parcelable)
    • android.app.NotificationManager
    • android.app.PendingIntent (implements android.os.Parcelable)
    • android.app.SearchManager (implements android.content.DialogInterface.OnCancelListener, android.content.DialogInterface.OnDismissListener)
    • java.lang.Throwable (implements java.io.Serializable)
      • java.lang.Exception
        • android.util.AndroidException
          • android.app.PendingIntent.CanceledException

接口分层结构

  • android.app.DatePickerDialog.OnDateSetListener
  • android.app.KeyguardManager.OnKeyguardExitResult
  • android.app.PendingIntent.OnFinished
  • android.app.SearchManager.OnCancelListener
  • android.app.SearchManager.OnDismissListener
  • android.app.TimePickerDialog.OnTimeSetListener
